typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		tpep_pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		pickup_date as date,
		dropoff_date as date,
		elapsed_minutes as double,
		pickup_hour as integer,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_distance as double,
		payment_type as string,
		ratecodeid as integer,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double,
		fare_amount as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		total_amount as double,
		VendorID as string,
		orig_geographyid as integer,
		dest_geographyid as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> source1
source(output(
		GeographyID as integer,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		LatLong as string,
		ZipcodeBKey as string,
		County as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Zipcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source2
source1 split(trip_distance < 5,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(shorttrips, longtrips)
ConditionalSplit1@shorttrips aggregate(groupBy(passenger_count),
	total_trips = count(tpep_pickup_datetime),
		trip_distance = avg(trip_distance)) ~> Aggregate1
populateLatLong, source2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
ConditionalSplit1@shorttrips derive(LatLong = concatWS(',',toString(round(4,pickup_latitude)), toString(round(4,pickup_longitude)))) ~> populateLatLong
